text:
It would be nice to be able to execute multiple tests in one run.

I have been looking around how to execute multiple tests in one run. I learned 
that I need to use some external application to do that. I tried dos and ant - 
and yes it is possible but it is not trivial and the output you get is quite 
different from what you would from a listener within JMeter.
creator: ralikwen@hotmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
You can use multiple ThreadGroups in sequence.

Otherwise, I don't think it's worth the extra effort and complication.

This way you can't put tests in a loop and change parameters like number of 
users accordingly.
